data.name: Document name - document date
data.description: Valid for customer, patient, and supplier documents only

data.name: Document name - patient full name - document date
Document name - patient full name - today's date
Document name - customer full name - document date
Document name - customer full name - today's date
Document name - supplier full name - document date
Document name - supplier full name - today's date
Default Appointment Reminder SMS Template
data.description: <patient>'s appointment at <location> is confirmed for <date/time>. Call us on <phone> if you need to change the appointment
data.content: concat(expr:if(expr:var('patient.name') != '', concat(expr:var('patient.name'), "'s"), 'Your'), ' appointment at ' , $location.name,' is confirmed for ', date:formatDate($appointment.startTime, 'short'), ' @ ', date:formatTime($appointment.startTime, 'short'), $nl, 'Call us on ', party:getTelephone($location), ' if you need to change the appointment')

data.name: Sample Vaccination Reminder SMS Template
data.description: <patient> is due for a vaccination at <location>. Call us on <phone> to make an appointment
data.content: concat($patient.name, ' is due for a vaccination at ', $location.name, '.', $nl, 'Please contact us on ', party:getTelephone($location), ' to make an appointment')
